metadata.synopsis: At the Knights of the Shield's cartel office, you can interact with some chairs, including Stelmane's. Stelmane's ones is a very impressive chair.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on Stelman's chair at Knights of the Shield's cartel office.Bookmark: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-464.441528;19.225742;-906.823059&camTarget=-463.858124;18.432352;-906.996765

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: | She always sat here when we conducted our business. It pleased me to stand while she laboured. Note the chair is impressive though - all the better to maintain the illusion of control where there was none. Of course, I grew fond of that chair. Even after her death, I never discarded it. It gave me comfort to see her in my mind's eye, sitting there in all her seriousness as I conducted her affairs. |
